long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Auto Tab Muter - Mute Tab Shortcuts 🔇

Tab Muter Pro is a powerful tool that lets you easily manage the sound of your browser tabs. You can mute or un-mute tabs with a single click or keyboard shortcuts.

🎯 Auto Tab Muter Features
**Smart Tab Control**
  - Instantly mute/unmute any tab with one click
  - Bulk mute/unmute all tabs simultaneously
  - Auto-mute new tabs feature
  - Keyboard shortcuts for quick control

**Intelligent Organization**
  - Automatically groups playing tabs
  - Prioritizes tabs with active audio
  - Clear visual indicators for audio status
  - Easy-to-use interface

 **Advanced Features**
  - Dark/Light theme support
  - Global keyboard shortcuts (Alt+M, Alt+Shift+M)
  - Multi-language support
  - Memory-efficient performance

🚀 Auto Tab Muter How to Use

### Basic Controls
1. Click the extension icon to open the control panel
2. Use the "Mute" or "Unmute" buttons for individual tabs
3. Click "Mute All Tabs" or "Unmute All Tabs" for bulk control

### Keyboard Shortcuts
- `Alt + M`: Toggle mute for current tab
- `Alt + Shift + M`: Toggle mute for all tabs

### Auto-Mute Feature
1. Open the extension popup
2. Enable "Auto-mute new tabs" switch
3. All newly opened tabs will be automatically muted

### Theme Selection
- Click the theme toggle button (sun/moon icon)
- Your preference is automatically saved

## 💡 Pro Tips

1. **For Video Streaming:**
   - Keep your main video unmuted while automatically muting new tabs

2. **During Meetings:**
   - Use keyboard shortcuts for quick audio control
   - Enable auto-mute to prevent unexpected sounds

3. **For Music:**
   - Pin music tabs to keep them easily accessible
   - Use the playing tabs section for quick access

4. **For Productivity:**
   - Enable auto-mute during focus sessions
   - Use bulk controls to manage multiple tabs efficiently

## 🎯 Perfect For
- Multi-tab users
- Online meeting participants
- Content creators
- Music/video streamers
- Productivity enthusiasts
- Social media users

## 🆘 Auto Tab Muter Support
For support or feature requests, please visit our support page or email us at tabmanagerproo@gamil.com

## 🔄 Updates
Regular updates with new features and improvements. Stay tuned for upcoming enhancements!


## 🔑 Keywords
- Tab Muter
- Auto Tab Muter
- Mute Tab Shortcuts
- Browser Audio Control
- Chrome Tab Sound Manager
- Tab Sound Control
- Browser Volume Manager
- Smart Tab Audio
- Quick Tab Mute
- Tab Sound Shortcuts

⚠ To support our plugin, puupnewsapp.com opens when your browser is opened and closed 10 times.
